Reviews.Title: UTTERLY HORRENDOUS
Reviews.Author: bk
Reviews.Content: Forget picture quality.  I couldn't even get the so-called software to install.  I know you can't expect much for $10, but why did they make it so inconvenient and complicated?  I just wanted a backup camera that could download to Explorer.  THIS IS A PIECE OF GARBAGE.

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera
Reviews.Author: a.tierrahall
Reviews.Content: I would not have purchased this stupid camera if I knew what kind of pictures it takes. They look awful. I wish I had not wasted my money.
